name: Escape from Bombard!
description:
This game is currently at the prototyping phase. I'm testing if people will like the idea.

Your objective is to reach at the farthest right point. There is a plane which drops bombs at you, you must avoid bombs.

If it gets enough positive responses, I intent to port it to mobile and send to publishers. Levels will be generated procedurally, platforms will be generated till player dies.

Visuals are currently crappy, I know. The purpose is to test the game mechanic.
